#summary Hot to use the FLV Player

= Hot to use the FLV Flash Fullscreen Video Player =

There are various methods to use the FLV Player
  * Links
  * iFrame
  * SWFObject
  * JavaScript Playlists
  * ActionScript

== How to embed the FLV Player using the links ==

The `flvplayer` contains an HTML page called `flashvideoplayer.html`.
